Title: An Act Establishing a Municipal Hospital in the Municipality of Bucay, Province of Abra, to be Known as the Bucay Municipal Hospital
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 597
An Act Establishing a Municipal Hospital in the Municipality of Bucay, Province of Abra, to be Known as the Bucay Municipal Hospital
Section 1. There shall be established a ten-bed municipal hospital in the Municipality of Bucay, Province of Abra, to be known as Bucay Municipal Hospital.1Ã¢wphi1
Section 2. The amount necessary for the construction and operation of the hospital not to exceed seven hundred fifty thousand pesos shall be funded out of the appropriations authorized by Batas Pambansa Blg. 230 for the Ministry of Health intended for new or expanded hospitals. Thereafter, such sum as may be necessary for its operation and maintenance shall be included in the annual General Appropriations Act.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: June 24, 1983
